thread.section_title: Event Decor Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Event Decor Direct | eventdecordirect.com
thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: Event Decor Direct reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: It was my first time ordering from a new company so I did not know what to expect. Although my order got messed up and I was only shipped half of my order, I spoke to someone in customer service and they over-nighted the rest of my order at no extra cost. Even though my order was messed up, they instantly rectified the situation and now have a lifetime customer. I will be ordering plenty more from this website. Not only am I happy with the service, the shipping & packaging quality, but the products are very good and good quality items.
